description: <wordwrap>A basic sword, good for stabbing things, if you can actually wield a sword. Perhaps you can sell it?
name: Sword

description: <wordwrap>A basic magical wand. Equipping it slightly increases your magical power and defense.
name: Basic Wand

description: <wordwrap>A basic magical staff. Like all staffs, it is more effective at boosting magical power than magical defense.
name: Basic Staff

description: <wordwrap>A basic magical tome. Like all tomes, it is more effective at boosting magical defense than magical power.
name: Basic Tome

description: <wordwrap>A corrupted wand filled with depraved energy. Provides a significant boost to offensive and defensive stats, but increases depravity by 2 at the end of each combat encounter.
name: Depraved Wand

description: <wordwrap>Provides a small boost to magic overall, and provides an 8% chance to fire two spells at once.
name: Swift Wand

description: <wordwrap>Though literally made of glass, it doesn’t seem likely to break. Diverts defensive energy towards offensive power, and provides a 15% chance fire two spells at once.
name: Glass Staff

description: <wordwrap>A stronger wand, only wieldable by the pure of heart. If your level of depravity is two or higher, you won’t be able to wield it.
name: Pure Wand

description: <wordwrap>A wand imbued with holy energy. It actually drains your magical strength, but reduces depravity by one at the end of each combat encounter.
name: Penance Wand

description: <wordwrap>Though literally made of glass, it doesn’t seem likely to break. Diverts defensive energy towards offensive power, and provides a 15% chance fire two spells at once.
name: Glass Staff+

description: <wordwrap>Diverts defensive energy towards offensive power, provides a 25% chance fire two spells at once.
name: Shattering Staff

description: <wordwrap>Attacks have a 25% chance of applying posion, dealing 5% of the targets max hp for two turns.
name: Staff of Posion

description: <wordwrap>Heals the user for 2% of their hp each turn of battle.
name: Enduring Tome

description: <WordWrap>The reflective tome passively reflects 20% of \fiall\fi damage taken.
name: Reflective Tome

description: <wordwrap>An intermediate magical wand. Equipping it moderately increases your magical power and defense.
name: Intermediate Wand

description: <wordwrap>An intermediate magical staff. Like all staffs, it is more effective at boosting magical power than magical defense.
name: Intermediate Staff

description: <wordwrap>An intermediate magical tome. Like all tomes, it is more effective at boosting magical defense than magical power.
name: Intermediate Tome

description: <WordWrap>While equipped, grants access to the "explosion" empowered spell. Deals \fimassive\fi magic damage to a single target, stunning it for a turn, and a third as much true damage to \fieveryone\fi else in the fight. Including yourself. Not effected by fire skill upgrades.
name: Volatile Staff

description: <WordWrap>All non-empowered ice spells provide +1 stack of frost shield upon cast.
name: Staff of Frost

description: <WordWrap>All non-empowered fire spells inflict 1 turn of burn upon targets.
name: Wand of Flames

description: <wordwrap>
name: Wand
